textBox.richText: Meeting up with Matthias, Ray, Tressa, Gunter and Lucille

Woke up to 2" of fresh, so I hit the slopes early. The Pano Trees were better than the bowl, so I did a couple runs there, then headed to eagle wind. Stalked Matthias and Ray, saw they were at Pioneer with Tressa, so headed over there and did a couple nice runs down Gambler and Aces and Eights. Lucille's lesson ended at noon, so we then caught up with them. Gunter came out and did some tele-drills in preparation for his lesson...Tressa and I joined him whilst everyone else did lunch. Had to fetch his poles from under the pony...(did he do that on purpose?) Hit a bunch of the mountain...good day!
